verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

נֶ֚פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh If a soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki When תֶחֱטָ֔א <S%H2398><s%> te-che-Ta, sin וּמָעֲלָ֥ה <S%H4603><s%> u-ma-'a-Lah and commit מַ֖עַל <S%H4604><s%> Ma-'al a trespass בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; against the LORD וְכִחֵ֨שׁ <S%H3584><s%> ve-chi-Chesh and lie בַּעֲמִית֜וֹ <S%H5997><s%> ba-'a-mi-To unto his neighbour בְּפִקָּד֗וֹן <S%H6487><s%> be-fik-ka-Don, in that which was delivered אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or בִתְשׂ֤וּמֶת <S%H8667><s%> vit-Su-met A security יָד֙ <S%H3027><s%> yad entrusted א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בְגָזֵ֔ל <S%H1498><s%> ve-ga-Zel, or in a thing taken away by violence א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or עָשַׁ֥ק <S%H6231><s%> 'a-Shak or hath deceived אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5997><s%> a-mi-To. his neighbour

אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or מָצָ֧א <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza Or have found אֲבֵדָ֛ה <S%H9><s%> 'a-ve-Dah that which was lost וְכִ֥חֶשׁ <S%H3584><s%> ve-Chi-chesh and lieth בָּ֖הּ bah וְנִשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> ve-nish-Ba' concerning it and sweareth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- regard שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker; falsely עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- regard אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat, in any מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol one אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh doeth הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam of all these that a man לַחֲטֹ֥א <S%H2398><s%> la-cha-To sinning בָהֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> va-Hen-nah. therein

וְהָיָה֮ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- shall be when יֶחֱטָ֣א <S%H2398><s%> ye-che-Ta Then it shall be because he hath sinned וְאָשֵׁם֒ <S%H816><s%> ve-'a-Shem and is guilty וְהֵשִׁ֨יב <S%H7725><s%> ve-he-Shiv that he shall restore אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַגְּזֵלָ֜ה <S%H1497><s%> hag-ge-ze-Lah which he took violently away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what גָּזָ֗ל <S%H1497><s%> ga-Zal, robbery א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֹ֙שֶׁק֙ <S%H6233><s%> ha-'O-shek or the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what עָשָׁ֔ק <S%H6231><s%> 'a-Shak, which he hath deceitfully gotten א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפִּקָּד֔וֹן <S%H6487><s%> hap-pik-ka-Don, the deposit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָפְקַ֖ד <S%H6487><s%> ha-fe-Kad the deposit אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> it-To; א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֲבֵדָ֖ה <S%H9><s%> ha-'a-ve-Dah or the lost thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מָצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza. which he found

א֠וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or מִכֹּ֞ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִשָּׁבַ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> yish-sha-Va' Or all that about which he hath sworn עָלָיו֮ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and לַשֶּׁקֶר֒ <S%H8267><s%> lash-she-Ker falsely וְשִׁלַּ֤ם <S%H7999><s%> ve-shil-Lam he shall even restore אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> be-ro-Sho, it in the principal וַחֲמִשִׁתָ֖יו <S%H2549><s%> va-cha-mi-shi-Tav the fifth part יֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sef more עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; to the one לַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> la-'a-Sher to whom ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he ל֛וֹ lo יִתְּנֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> yit-te-Nen-nu thereto [and] give בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom it unto him to whom it appertaineth in the day אַשְׁמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H819><s%> ash-ma-To. of his trespass offering

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲשָׁמ֥וֹ <S%H817><s%> a-sha-Mo his trespass offering יָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vi And he shall bring לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> 'A-yil a ram תָּמִ֧ים <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim without blemish מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַצֹּ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon out of the flock בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <S%H6187><s%> be-'er-ke-Cha with thy estimation לְאָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> le-'a-Sham for a trespass offering אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen. unto the priest

וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> ve-chip-Per shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei for him before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD וְנִסְלַ֣ח <S%H5545><s%> ve-nis-Lach and it shall be forgiven ל֑וֹ lo; עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat him for any thing מִכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of the things אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh of all that he hath done לְאַשְׁמָ֥ה <S%H819><s%> le-'ash-Mah in trespassing בָֽהּ׃ Vah. פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying
